actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to permit the sale of rights to use water for privately owned land in the Imperial Irrigation District in California without regard to certain restrictions imposed by the Reclamation Act of 1902.

summary.text: Allows the sale of rights to use water for privately owned land in the Imperial Irrigation District in California without regard to acreage, residence, and payment restrictions of the Reclamation Act of 1902.

titles.title: A bill to permit the sale of rights to use water for privately owned land in the Imperial Irrigation District in California without regard to certain restrictions imposed by the Reclamation Act of 1902.
